Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the number of documented cases where Obama has lied, as there is no evidence provided to support the claim of over 200 cases.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support, as the expert who made the claim did not provide any sources or evidence for the 200 documented cases.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that all the instances listed on the website Infowars.com are valid cases of lying by Obama, without considering that some may be a difference of opinion over policy.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the instances listed as lies, as different fact-checking organizations have rated some of them differently.
